definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: Rewards for past good deeds will be yours.
sentences.chinese: 往時的善事會給帶來報答。

sentences.english: She was much looked up to for her kindnesses .
sentences.chinese: 她因多行善事而受人尊敬。

sentences.english: Apologists for religion point to charitable works as some sort of justification for it.
sentences.chinese: 辯護者提到慈善事業作爲爲宗教辯護的理由。

sentences.english: This does not bode well for China’s future growth.
sentences.chinese: 這對中國未來的增長而言並非善事。

sentences.english: Therefore it is lawful to do good on the Sabbath.
sentences.chinese: 所以在安息日作善事是可以的。

sentences.english: The other charities she supported also seem to be distancing themselves.
sentences.chinese: 她支持的其他慈善事業，似乎對她也盡而遠之。

sentences.english: I am glad therefore on your behalf: but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good, and simple concerning evil.
sentences.chinese: 但我願意你們在善事上聰明，在惡上愚拙。

sentences.english: But Pitt pursues nonphilanthropic projects, too.
sentences.chinese: 小布也不忘追求非慈善事業計畫。

sentences.english: It's fantastic because it all goes to charity.
sentences.chinese: 這太了不起了，因爲它全都流向了慈善事業。

sentences.english: It's a survival skill that allows us no time or energy for more altruistic and generous activities, and too little time for reflection.
sentences.chinese: 生存之道不允許我們有時間與精力去做善事與反思。

sentences.english: Bill is such a penny pincher . He never gives a cent to charity.
sentences.chinese: 比爾是個吝嗇鬼，從未爲慈善事業捐過一分錢。

sentences.english: He disposed his money in charity.
sentences.chinese: 他將自己的錢用於慈善事業。

sentences.english: Other torchbearers have pledged to donate the proceeds from the sale to charity.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些火炬手保證將出售所得用於慈善事業。

sentences.english: Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days.
sentences.chinese: 所以在安息日作善事是可以的。

sentences.english: Look for charities that you believe in and to which you have some affinity.
sentences.chinese: 尋找慈善事業，相信你和你具有一定的親和力。

sentences.english: Like to do good things, and be happy?
sentences.chinese: 喜歡做善事，樂於拿財物接濟有困難的人。

definition: to do good works/to be merciful
to accumulate merit/to do good/to give to charity/virtuous actions
to offend Heaven and reason (idiom); bloody atrocities that cry to heaven/outrageous acts
no end of virtuous achievements (idiom); boundless beneficence
